Text: Independence, Virginia:  The population was 947 at the 2010 census.

Text: Independence, Virginia:  It is the county seat of Grayson County.

Text: Independence, Virginia:  Independence is home to a major town celebration on July 4 every year, held in front of the 1908 courthouse.

<Text: Independence, Virginia:  The courthouse is also the location of the Mountain Foliage Festival, held in the autumn and featuring a parade, crafts, arts and music, as well as a race in which contestants use outhouses, the Grand Privy Race.>
